entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending after midnight. Clearing overnight. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Light snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
